description: Join us for a focused session on scalable blockchain infrastructure hosted by Optimum & AWS, together with Amber, Auros, B-Harvest, Blockdaemon, Caladan, Coinfund, SNZ, Flow traders and Further Ventures. The event brings together blockchain enthusiasts, developers, and innovators in Hong Kong. Meet project co-founders, core developers, users, and foundation leaders to exchange insights on scaling Web3 infrastructure. Date/Time Feb 11 (Wed), 10:00 14:00 Agenda 10:00 10:30: Welcome & Registration 10:30 10:50: Optimum Introduction 11:00 11:30: Panel Disucssion 1 : From Infrastructure to Liquidity: How Performance Becomes Alpha 11:30 12:30: Lunch Break and Networking 12:30 13:00: Panel Discussion 2 : Where Smart Capital Is Moving in the Infrastructure Cycle 13:00 13:30: Panel Discussion 3 : Risk, Resilience, and Market Stability Designing Markets That Don t Break Under Stress 13:30 14:00: Networking #Please register using your company email address for priority approval.
